import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Moment from 'react-moment' class Posts extends Component { render() { console.log(this.props.posts) return (
    {this.props.posts.length > 0 && this.props.posts.map(post => (

  • {post.title}

    {post.timestamp}
    {post.category}
    {post.commentCount}
    {post.voteScore}

    {post.body}

    • )) }
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return state } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Posts)
